result.markdown: --- title: BradleyTerryScalable description: | {BradleyTerryScalable} is an R package for fitting the Bradley-Terry model to pair-comparison data, to enable statistically principled ranking of a potentially large number of objects. date: 2020-03-04 author: - name: Ella Kaye #url: httep://twitter.com/ellakaye - name: David Firth site-url: https://ellakaye.co.uk image: ../../images/hex/BradleyTerryScalable.png # N.B. Don't use "" in image-alt #image-alt: | #categories: # - TAG_1 # - TAG_2 #twitter-card: # uncomment lines below for different title and description to post # title: | # description: | # uncomment for different image to post # image: | # image-alt: | # defaults to 500 x 500 summary: uncomment lines below for large card # image-width: 600 # image-height: 314 # card-style: "summary_large_image" draft: false --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## Main resources ` source`{=html} ` documentation`{=html} ` hex sticker`{=html} ## Additional resources An overview of the BradleyTerryScalable package (2022): ` slides`{=html} ` materials`{=html} A presentation introducing the BradleyTerryScalable package (2017): ` slides`{=html} ` materials`{=html}
